import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react'; import NoteContext from '../Context/Notes/NoteContext'; const NotesItem = (props) => { const {deleteNote} = useContext(NoteContext) const { note } = props; return (
{note.title}
{return deleteNote(note._id)}}>

{note.description}

) } export default NotesItem
